mapper.insert: insert into community.comment(parent_id, type, commentator, created, modified, content) VALUES (#{parentId},#{type},#{commentator},#{created},#{modified},#{content});
mapper.select: select count(1) from community.comment where parent_id = #{qId} and type = #{type};
select * from community.comment where parent_id = #{qId} and type = #{type} limit #{offset},#{pageSize};
select username from community.user where id = #{commentator};
select avatar_url from community.user where id = #{commentator};
